nodes.text: The Lost Sultans of Lust were a group hailing from the Lust system who dined with the Human scholar Ebenn Q3 Baobab at some point prior to the year 6 ABY. Baobab wrote about the encounter in his autobiography, Blazing Rockets, and the group was also mentioned in his book Galactic Phrase & Travel Guide.

The Lost Sultans of Lust were first mentioned in the Galactic Phrase Book & Travel Guide, which was written by Ben Burtt and released in 2001. The book did not make clear at what stage of his life Baobab dined with the Sultans.
